price: 4. Kaadu sinaamey Yalli siinit abe ginoo kee mutuccu ittaamat abeh yan ginoo kee fixiixisiyyat yaamineeh yasmite marah Yallaa kee Yallih diinih nabna tascasse astooti tan.
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
